title: Crater Lake National Park: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs       For general park information or help planning your visit, please see the Plan Your Visit section of this Web site or call the visitor center at 541-594-3100.   For news media inquiries, contact: Public Information Officer Jennifer Evans Crater Lake National Park PO Box 7 Crater Lake, OR 97604 Phone: 541-594-3002 Fax: 541-594-3010 crla_public_affairs@nps.gov
